Specific Details: GCCN wrote to Galway City Council urging the return of local democratic structures including the Galway City Local Community Development Committee, the Strategic Policy Committees and the Joint Policing Committee, which had been deferred during the initial stages of the COVID-19 pandemic. GCCN also called for responses to the COVID-19 pandemic to be prioritized as a work area for each structure

Specific Details: Notify local representatives of poor compliance with HIQA standards, confirmed by HIQA inspection reports. Identify contributing factor in the under-resourcing of Ability West services and issue of lack of pay parity for Ability West employees (Section 39 agency).

Subject Matter: Notify local representatives of poor compliance with HIQA standards, confirmed by HIQA inspection reports. Identify contributing factor in the under-resourcing of Ability West services and issue of lack of pay parity for Ability West employees (Section 39 agency).
